title: Russia omitted details on Boston Marathon bombing suspect: NYT
description: (Reuters) - Russia declined several FBI requests for more information on Boston Marathon bombing suspect Tamerlan Tsarnaev two years before the deadly 2013 attack, the New York Times reported on Wednesday, citing an unpublished U.S. government review.

title: My Fiancé Almost Died in the Boston Marathon Bombings
description: Last April, Marc Fucarile was watching the Boston Marathon with friends when two bombs exploded near the finish line. He was gravely injured: The second blast blew off Fucarile’s right leg, broke his spine, and riddled his body with BBs and shrapnel.
